Movie_Cast: Tom Cruise, Emily Blunt, Bill Paxton, Brendan Gleeson

Movie_Des: Georges and Anne are an octogenarian couple. They are cultivated, retired music teachers. Their daughter, also a musician, lives in Britain with her family. One day, Anne has a stroke, and the couple's bond of love is severely tested.

Movie_Cast: Kåre Hedebrant, Lina Leandersson, Per Ragnar, Henrik Dahl
Movie_Des: Oskar, an overlooked and bullied boy, finds love and revenge through Eli, a beautiful but peculiar girl.

Movie_Cast: Sharlto Copley, David James, Jason Cope, Nathalie Boltt

Movie_Cast: Mickey Rourke, Marisa Tomei, Evan Rachel Wood, Mark Margolis

Movie_Cast: Shahid Kapoor, Kareena Kapoor, Tarun Arora, Dara Singh Randhawa
Movie_Des: A depressed wealthy businessman finds his life changing after he meets a spunky and care-free young woman.

Movie_Cast: Ellar Coltrane, Patricia Arquette, Ethan Hawke, Elijah Smith

Movie_Cast: Anamaria Marinca, Laura Vasiliu, Vlad Ivanov, Alexandru Potocean
Movie_Des: A woman assists her friend in arranging an illegal abortion in 1980s Romania.

Movie_Cast: Colin Farrell, Brendan Gleeson, Ciarán Hinds, Elizabeth Berrington

Movie_Cast: David Lee Smith, Tony Todd, John Billingsley, Ellen Crawford

Movie_Cast: Sam Worthington, Zoe Saldana, Sigourney Weaver, Michelle Rodriguez

Movie_Des: The story of the battle of Iwo Jima between the United States and Imperial Japan during World War II, as told from the perspective of the Japanese who fought it.

Movie_Des: A young man who survives a disaster at sea is hurtled into an epic journey of adventure and discovery. While cast away, he forms an unexpected connection with another survivor: a fearsome Bengal tiger.

Movie_Cast: George Clooney, Meryl Streep, Bill Murray, Jason Schwartzman
Movie_Des: An urbane fox cannot resist returning to his farm raiding ways and then must help his community survive the farmers' retaliation.

Movie_Cast: Seung-Yun Lee, Hee Jae, Hyuk-ho Kwon, Jin-mo Joo
Movie_Des: A transient young man breaks into empty homes to partake of the vacationing residents' lives for a few days.

Movie_Cast: Shah Rukh Khan, Preity Zinta, Rani Mukerji, Kirron Kher

Movie_Des: A young French Canadian, one of five boys in a conservative family in the 1960s and 1970s, struggles to reconcile his emerging identity with his father's values.

Movie_Cast: Vladimir Garin, Ivan Dobronravov, Konstantin Lavronenko, Nataliya Vdovina

Movie_Des: The new teacher at a severely administered boys' boarding school works to positively affect the students' lives through music.

Movie_Cast: Robert Downey Jr., Gwyneth Paltrow, Terrence Howard, Jeff Bridges
Movie_Des: After being held captive in an Afghan cave, billionaire engineer Tony Stark creates a unique weaponized suit of armor to fight evil.

Movie_Cast: Simon Pegg, Nick Frost, Kate Ashfield, Lucy Davis
Movie_Des: The uneventful, aimless lives of a London electronics salesman and his layabout roommate are disrupted by the zombie apocalypse.

Movie_Cast: Birol Ünel, Sibel Kekilli, Güven Kiraç, Zarah Jane McKenzie

Movie_Cast: Sean Penn, Tim Robbins, Kevin Bacon, Emmy Rossum
Movie_Des: The lives of three men who were childhood friends are shattered when one of them has a family tragedy.

Movie_Name: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban

Movie_Des: A defense officer, Nameless, was summoned by the King of Qin regarding his success of terminating three warriors.

Movie_Cast: Rosario Flores, Javier Cámara, Darío Grandinetti, Leonor Watling

Movie_Des: Two terminally ill patients escape from a hospital, steal a car and rush towards the sea.

Movie_Des: Back when sex was safe, pleasure was a business and business was booming, an idealistic porn producer aspires to elevate his craft to an art when he discovers a hot young talent.

Movie_Des: A love story between a girl who loves reading books, and a boy who has previously checked out all of the library books she chooses.

Movie_Cast: Jonathan Pryce, Kim Greist, Robert De Niro, Katherine Helmond

Movie_Cast: Henry Thomas, Drew Barrymore, Peter Coyote, Dee Wallace

Movie_Des: The life of a divorced television writer dating a teenage girl is further complicated when he falls in love with his best friend's mistress.

Movie_Des: Romance and suspense ensue in Paris as a woman is pursued by several men who want a fortune her murdered husband had stolen. Whom can she trust?

Movie_Cast: Glenn Ford, Gloria Grahame, Jocelyn Brando, Alexander Scourby

Movie_Cast: Farley Granger, Robert Walker, Ruth Roman, Leo G. Carroll
Movie_Des: A psychopath forces a tennis star to comply with his theory that two strangers can get away with murder.

Movie_Cast: Humphrey Bogart, Gloria Grahame, Frank Lovejoy, Carl Benton Reid
Movie_Des: A potentially violent screenwriter is a murder suspect until his lovely neighbor clears him. However, she soon starts to have her doubts.

Movie_Des: The daughter of a convicted Nazi spy is asked by American agents to gather information on a ring of Nazi scientists in South America. How far will she have to go to ingratiate herself with them?

Movie_Cast: Jean Marais, Josette Day, Mila Parély, Nane Germon

Movie_Des: When a rich woman's ex-husband and a tabloid-type reporter turn up just before her planned remarriage, she begins to learn the truth about herself.

Movie_Cast: Cary Grant, Rosalind Russell, Ralph Bellamy, Gene Lockhart
Movie_Des: A newspaper editor uses every trick in the book to keep his ace reporter ex-wife from remarrying.

Movie_Cast: Errol Flynn, Olivia de Havilland, Basil Rathbone, Claude Rains

Movie_Cast: William Powell, Myrna Loy, Maureen O'Sullivan, Nat Pendleton
Movie_Des: Former detective Nick Charles and his wealthy wife Nora investigate a murder case, mostly for the fun of it.

Movie_Cast: Fay Wray, Robert Armstrong, Bruce Cabot, Frank Reicher

Movie_Des: Goku and Vegeta encounter Broly, a Saiyan warrior unlike any fighter they've faced before.

Movie_Cast: Fionn Whitehead, Barry Keoghan, Mark Rylance, Tom Hardy
